text: During MTV ’ s 2015 VMAs Vanessa Hudgens stood out with her beautiful Naeem Khan gown and boho hairdo. We loved her romantic hairstyle so much we had to share how to get her look at home. Schwarzkopf celebrity hairstylist, Richard Collins, created Vanessa Hudgens ’ s bohemian chic, dreamy look. How to get Vanessa Hudgens ’ s boho chic hair Step 1 : Start with dry hair ; work in a protective hair spray for hot tools protection and initial shine. Collins used Schwarzkopf styliste Crystal Shine & Hold Heat Protection Shine Spray throughout Vanessa ’ s hair.
